name: Keonjinn LED Bathroom Mirror 28 x 36 Inch Bathroom Mirror with Lights Front Lighted Makeup Mirror Anti-Fog Dimmable UL Listed LED Driver Tempered Glass Wall Mounted Vanity Mirror (Vertical/Horizontal)
about_this_item: 【Dimmable & Memory】 The brightness of this modern led mirror is dimmable, short press to turn the mirror light on/off while long press on the button can adjust the brightness of the mirror (10%-100%). With the UL listed LED power driver, this wonderful bathroom mirror are available for an excellent lighting experience. When the LED mirror is restarted after a power failure, it will return to the last use, no need to adjust again.

【Safe Defogging】 The frontlit mirror's light and anti-fog are controlled separately. To avoid overheating of the mirror due to long time use of defogging, the anti fog function will automatically turn off after one hour of continuous use, then you need to click the defogging button to turn on the defogging function again.

【Easy Flexible Installation】Super easy to install with French cleat brackets. Our bathroom mirror support normal wall switch control and can be connected using plugs or hardwired. Can be installed in bathroom, bedroom and the room you want to install. Only plays an auxiliary role in the brightness of the room, and is not recommended as a separate lighting.

【Tempered Glass & Packaging】 Strong and safe tempered glass are resistant to breakage, ensuring your daily use for safety. Newly improved packing greatly reduces damage during transportation. Keonjinn led mirrors have passed all tests including dropping test, impact test, heavy pressure test etc.

【Brand Keonjinn】 As the leading brand in the mirror category, we have been committed to providing consumers with affordable quality mirrors and have received over 7,800 reviews on Amazon for 6 years. We are constantly improving the craftsmanship and packaging of our mirrors to ensure that our mirrors reach our customers intact. Please don't hesitate to get in touch if there's anything we can help with you.

title: Value, beauty, utility…superb
content: I installed this LED mirror to modernized my guest bath.  Added a recessed light receptacle for it, connected to vanity light.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Installed two of these mirrors in our bathrooms today.  We wanted to get lighted mirrors since the lighting in the bathrooms was not great for getting ready.  I will say that these mirrors are a significant upgrade to what we had.  They are very clear and provide a good amount of light, which can be adjusted brighter or softer.  We haven't used the defogger yet but testing it out made the surface heat up so it should probably work.

title: It's good but could be better
content: As a service technician, being inside other people's homes, I've seen what these lit up mirrors are capable of and how bright they can be. When my mirror came in, the box was beat up and even our UPS driver told me his came in broken and to check the box out. Our mirror was not damaged thankfully.

title: Verified Purchase

I brought it into the bathroom where the vanity mirror and light was being replaced, and compared the brightness of the two. The mirrors built in light even adjusted to its highest setting is half of what two light bulbs would be considered. I've certainly seen brighter so that's where my "it could be better" is coming from.

title: Love it
content: An electrician will need help hanging this mirror and our guy was amazing. The only complaint is that the hardware, which is 4- 3" ( I think) and 4 PLASTIC holders. Unless this is new construction, you can't plan where the hangars will attach, since these are set. You totally need to install this very heavy mirror in the studs and since our home is now 30 years old, and we were replacing our existing mirror, the drywall, would not hold the molly bolts he used in place of the tiny PLASTIC screw holders. The studs of course were in the wrong place and the only part  of the mirror was on the upper left corner. The electrician made his own hardware that solved the problem. So using molly bolts, still would not hold and blew out of the drywall. Also the points which are on the back of this mirror ARE NOT ADJUSTABLE. So the connection points have to be exact!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: Love the mirror it makes
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2024

title: One Year Later - Still Love this Mirror
content: We remodeled our bathroom in late 2020, and this mirror was one of the upgrades included in our remodel. After a year of daily use of both the LED lighting and the heated anti-fog feature, we are still very pleased with our purchase.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: The mirror came well-packaged and there was no shipping damage. It was a bit of a pain to mount on the wall (having a helper is necessary), and according to a family member who is an electrician who helped me mount/wire this mirror, the wiring is odd; if I remember, the wiring only has white and black wires for power, there is no grounding). Mounting this took about an hour, as we were being very cautious to ensure it was perfectly level. The instructions for mounting were laughably lacking; if I remember correctly, we threw away the instructions as they weren't much help. We mounted ours to drywall and it is worth mentioning that this mirror is  heavy, so buying some high-quality drywall mounts separately from the mirror is an absolute necessity in my opinion.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023

title: Very Satisfied!

No idea if I'll get a response or not.  I like the mirror but....

title: Good!!  Hoping it lasts
content: Replacing light fixture and mirror in guest bathroom with this mirror.  It looks way more modern and is super functional.  Although it looked like it would be relatively easy to install, I opted for an electrician to do it because there was no ground wire coming from the mirror and I just didn’t want to mess it up.  (30 min total) There is a tiny delay from flicking the switch to the mirror lighting up but it seems to work well.  You can adjust the brightness by holding down the power button on the mirror.  It’s a fairly intense LED, so if you are looking for soft white, this isn’t for you, although you can dim the bright white.  Haven’t used the anti-fog feature yet. It arrives well-packed in styrofoam.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: This mirror was exactly what we were looking for to give our open vanity area that hotel look. It’s not super bright, so if you are going to be applying makeup in you bathroom, I’d add supplemental lighting or get a brighter mirror. The light is very cool toned, so if you’re looking for warm white light, this is not for you. Our handyman installed it very easily using the j box for the old light fixture. We can use the switch on the wall or the button on the mirror itself to turn it on. It does not make any weird buzzing sounds.  Can’t speak to the defrost, as we have no need to use it. Pictured is the 36x28 size. Excuse the mess.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2020

title: Great mirror - didn't have any instructions
content: I guess I got a newer one where the wires were the appropriate color. It did not come with any hardware or instructions. I wouldn't trust whatever cheap hardware that would come with it anyway. Get good anchors and measure accurately as there isn't much wiggle room. Looks great and the de-fogger works just fine right in the center. It is not bright so this shouldn't be your only light in your bathroom.

title: Verified Purchase
content: This was the perfect compliment to my updated bathroom.  You won't be disappointed. It can be installed vertical or horizontally.  If you don't want it to get power when you flip your light switch, you have to put it on a separate switch.  Mine is attached to the light switch, so it gets power (the little blue lights come on) I still have to turn it on (turns from blue to white), but it cannot be on by itself unless my bathroom lights are on.  I did try to see what it looked like with the lights out (unscrewed the bulbs) - and its not very bright.  So, I'll leave it as it is.  Gorgeous!!!

title: Verified Purchase
content: Overall, nice product. Came all in one piece and not damaged. Mirror is hard wired, so make sure you have an outlet behind mirror. You will need additional wire if your outlet is too far away from the mirrors wiring. Wiring is blue and brown. Not correct wiring coloring, but I wired blue to black and brown to neutral, that worked for me. Light is nice, but not enough for entire bathroom.  Hope this helps because directions are horribly written. For the money and additional lighting it's worth the buy.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2019

title: Nice fixture, bad directions.
content: I would like for this mirror to be brighter, but the quality of the light is very nice. I had an old florescent light with a pull-chain and no light switch, so this was the perfect solution! I had my handyman install it because it was too heavy and cumbersome for me to deal with, but he put it up in 30 minutes. The glow from the buttons creates the perfect nightlight, too.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I've had 4 of these now. Not because they're great but because they kept breaking and I had to return them. The electronics have to be the most cheaply made light fixture on the planet. One of them wouldnt turn on right out of the box, another one would turn on but made this terrible buzzing noise that could be heard from another room, and another one is doing the same thing but the noise is not as loud so we're just dealing with it. Out of the 4 mirrors we've received, only 1 works well.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021

title: Gorgeous Mirror
content: Also, they are very difficult to install. They don't come with a template, and for a mirror that isn't going to be glued... a template really should be included. I know it sounds dumb, "why don't you just measure properly". Well the mount holes are rather small and pretty far apart, so if your measurement is off by a couple millimeters then its not happening and you have to put more holes in your wall.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: And finally, the electrical cable is too short. It's like 2 feet. If you're hooking it up to wiring in your wall then that's probably not a big deal, but if you're planning on plugging it into outlet then you'll have to extend it.

title: Not superb, but not terrible either....
content: Also you need to watch the other types of lighting you have in the room, because if the light color is different than one or the other of the lights seems to look out of place...
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019

title: Verified Purchase
content: The lighting is great. And I love the touch on/off switch. It was screwed too tight in the back and made some of the back plastic crack around the screws. That was the only issue. My boyfriend had to strip an old lamp wire so I would be able to plug it in to an outlet, a different alternative if you rent like we do and can't do any real wiring. Bought it new, and I think it is worth the money.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021

title: Very satisfied
content: The mirror met all my expectations. It was easy to install and works like a charm. Before getting into the shower, touch the defrost mode, and when out of the shower, the mirror is clear. The adjustable light brightness is a nice touch. Would recommend this product if that is what you need.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: Exactly what she was wanting. These lights are not for bathroom lighting but for mirror lighting only. Look awesome and worked as expected. Installation can be a pain, wish it had a bracket instead of just screw holes, but it works.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022

title: Good lighted bathroom mirror.
content: The product is designed extremely bad. The back of the mirror is solid flat rather than having a void that can accommodate wire or outlet (even a recessed outlet), a wire projects out of flat surface at the back, it would not allow the mirror to be installed flushed on the wall. The screw holes at the back of the mirror to hang on the wall right at the edge of the mirror back frame (less than 0.5"), and they are fixed. You have to get the screws on both side exactly at a precise distance to mount the mirror, no room for adjustment. This is even a bigger problem if you have to change the location of the screes on the wall (because of wires, studs or other obstacles), and now you will have at least one of the holes outside the area covered by mirror. That is a huge problem on a tiled wall as you cannot fill a hole in a tile and make it good.  Overall, very poor design, low quality material. Had to return and buy from another brand. Waste of time.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: We bought this mirror 10 months ago, and everyone loves it!  It is bright and beautiful.  Anyone who sees it (I make sure to turn the light on when we have company, to show it off!) always compliments us on it!  My son installed it, and he said it wasn't difficult, but, he is an electrician so I don't know if it's an issue for an untrained person.  It is one of the best purchases we made in our remodel!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2021

title: She Loves Em
content: I received both of these mirrors and opened them and was impressed. They will look great in new bathroom space; however, the biggest problem is both mirrors have scratches on the front of the mirror. They are not able to be buffed out as are into the glass surface. Having to get them replaced and hoping I just got unlucky that 2 have scratches and I won’t have to return them again. Will update review when replacements arrive.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: It is a beautiful mirror and so far, has fit most of my expectations.  My only draw back is the brightness.  I really anticipated more, but it is  just not a super bright vanity.  Love the look in my newly remodeled bath.
